an4.130:3.1: 130 Incredible Things About the Wheel-turning Monarch
an4.130:4.1: “Mendicants, there are these four incredible and amazing things about a wheel-turning monarch.
an4.130:4.3: If an assembly of aristocrats goes to see a wheel-turning monarch, they’re uplifted by seeing him
an4.130:4.4: and uplifted by hearing him speak.
an4.130:4.5: And when he falls silent, they’ve never had enough.
an4.130:7.1: or ascetics goes to see a wheel-turning monarch, they’re uplifted by seeing him
an4.130:7.2: and uplifted by hearing him speak.
an4.130:7.3: And when he falls silent, they’ve never had enough.
an4.130:7.4: These are the four incredible and amazing things about a wheel-turning monarch.”
an4.130:8.1: So too, there are these four incredible and amazing things about Ānanda.
an4.130:8.3: If an assembly of monks goes to see Ānanda, they’re uplifted by seeing him
an4.130:8.4: and uplifted by hearing him speak.
an4.130:8.5: And when he falls silent, they’ve never had enough.
an4.130:9.1: If an assembly of nuns … laymen … or laywomen goes to see Ānanda, they’re uplifted by seeing him
an4.130:9.2: and uplifted by hearing him speak.
an4.130:9.3: And when he falls silent, they’ve never had enough.
an4.130:9.4: These are the four incredible and amazing things about Ānanda.”
